owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

use_default.description: Whether to use the default template or not. If `true`, the `include_claim_keys` field is ignored.

include_claim_keys.description: Array of unique strings. Each claim key can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores.
